Services.name: UI/UX Design
Services.desc: MongoDB runs as a standard program. You can start MongoDB from a command line by issuing the mongod command and specifying options. For a list of options, see the mongod reference. MongoDB can also run as a Windows service. For details, see Start MongoDB Community Edition as a Windows Service. To install MongoDB, see Install MongoDB.

Clients.name: Eric Clark
Clients.review: Tech Exactly delivered quality work on time and at a reasonable cost, satisfying the client due to the excellent value for the money. The platform is now operating, with 125 players and 27 clubs already registered. The team was communicative and offered great project management.
